ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - Get App Files
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Copies application files from the nominated network share to the target VM.
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# MWS2 - Get App Files ############################################################## # Author: Marina Krynina # Desc: Deploys installation files onto the target server ############################################################################################
# Mandatory heading # Load Common functions . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\VariableUtility.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1
######################################################################### # Main # - Deploys installation files onto the target server ######################################################################### try { $scriptPath = $env:USERPROFILE . .\LoggingV2.ps1 $true $scriptPath "GetAppFiles.ps1"
log "INFO: Getting variables values or setting defaults if the variables are not populated." $sourceFolders = (Get-VariableValue $SOURCE "" $false)
foreach($srcFolder in ($sourceFolders.Replace(" ", "")).Split(",")) { log "INFO: Deploying $srcFolder folder onto the target VM" get-appfiles $srcFolder }
log "INFO: Finished $msg."
exit 0 } catch { $ex = $_.Exception | format-list | Out-String log "ERROR: Exception occurred `nException Message: $ex"
exit 1 }

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SOURCE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Folder on a network share where install files and supporting scripts are stored. The content of the folder will be copied onto a target server.

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - Extract App Files
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Extracts ISO, ZIP application files using 7zip in the given folder including subfolders
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
# MWS2R2 - Extract App Files ############################################################### # Author: Marina Krynina # Desc: Extracts application files (ISO, ZIP) ############################################################################################
# Mandatory heading # Load Common functions . .\GlobalRepository.ps1 . .\VariableUtility.ps1 . .\FilesUtility.ps1 . .\LaunchProcess.ps1
######################################################################### # Main ######################################################################### try { # Folder structure in the Global Repository # \Global Repository # \$SOURCE, folder name in the Global Repository
# Folder structure on VM # C:\Users\InstallerAccount # \$INSTALL_MEDIA - the content of the isntall media will be extracted here
$scriptPath = $env:USERPROFILE . .\LoggingV2.ps1 $true $scriptPath "ExtractAppFiles.ps1"
log "INFO: Getting variables values or setting defaults if the variables are not populated." $installMedia = (Get-VariableValue $INSTALL_MEDIA "" $false)
# Extracting $msg = "Extracting application installation files" log "INFO: Starting $msg"
# 7za920.exe does not support ISO files, 7z.exe does. # 7z files are located in the Common folder and copied by default $extractionTool = "$scriptPath\7z.exe"
foreach($srcFolder in ($installMedia.Replace(" ", "")).Split(",")) {
if (([string]::IsNullOrEmpty($installMedia)) -eq $true) { $installMediaSource = "$scriptPath" } else { $installMediaSource = "$scriptPath\$srcFolder" }
Extract $extractionTool $installMediaSource }
log "INFO: Finished $msg."
exit 0 } catch { $ex = $_.Exception | format-list | Out-String log "ERROR: Exception occurred `nException Message: $ex"
exit 1 }

ns1:variable.ns1:name: INSTALL_MEDIA
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Folder name where installation media is located.

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - SQL Windows Configure
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Perform Windows Configuration such as activating a Windows feature required by SQL Clustering
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:body:
try { $scriptPath = $env:USERPROFILE . .\LoggingV2.ps1 $true $scriptPath "ConfigureWindowsFeature.ps1" . .\ConfigureWindowsFeature.ps1
. .\ConfigureMWS2Registry.ps1 CreateCustomNodes $MWSREGISTRYXMLFILENAME
exit 0 } catch { $ex = $_.Exception | format-list | Out-String log "ERROR: Exception occurred `nException Message: $ex"
exit 1 }

ns1:variable.ns1:name: WINDOWSFEATUREXMLFILENAME
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Filename describing which features to activate

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - Configure Windows Users
MWS2R2 - Configure SPNs

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SPNXMLFILE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: XML file containing SPNs to register

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - SQL PreStage Cluster
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Prestage the AD Objects required by the Windows and SQL Cluster

ns1:variable.ns1:name: CLUSTERNAMES
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Cluster names delimited by semi-colon eg CLN-001

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - SQL SCCM Requirements
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Apply SCCM requirements to SQL DB servers

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - SQL Configure
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Parent SQL configuration script that will initiate configuration such as user permissions and SQL ports

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SQLPORTSXMLFILE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Filename of XML containing SQL Port configuration

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SQLUSERSXMLFILE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: To be deleted DO NOT USE

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SQLMEMORYXMLFILE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Filename of XML containing SQL Min/Max Memory configuration

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - Configure Shared Disk
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Initialise, Partition and Format the shared disks

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SHAREDDISKXMLFILENAME
ns1:variable.ns1:description: XML file containing shared disks to be configued

ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - Configure Windows Cluster
MWS2R2 - SQL Install SQL2012Ent Cluster
ns1:pendingAsset.ns1:description: Install SQL Server and required DB instances

ns1:Asset.ns1:name: MWS2R2 - SQL Cluster Install
ns1:Asset.ns1:description: Get, extract and install the SQL Server cluster, including dependencies. Then configure users and ports

ns1:variable.ns1:name: SQLUSERSXMLFILE
ns1:variable.ns1:description: Name of XML file containing user permissions
